Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 G2019S or SNCA A53T variants.

Readout description.Result Description: LRRK2 G2019S showed 2.5-fold increased kinase activity compared to wild-type.
SNCA A53T exhibited 1.8-fold increased α-synuclein aggregation.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 and SNCA plasmids were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector transfection was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 1.5-fold of wild-type; α-synuclein aggregation < 20%.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity > 2-fold of wild-type; α-synuclein aggregation ≥ 30%.

Material used.Material Name: Postmortem brain tissue from Parkinson's disease patients
Material used.Description: Immunohistochemistry was performed on brain tissue samples from Parkinson's disease patients with LRRK2 G2019S or SNCA A53T mutations.

Readout description.Result Description: LRRK2 G2019S showed increased phosphorylation of α-synuclein in dopaminergic neurons.
SNCA A53T exhibited extensive Lewy body pathology in the substantia nigra.

Biological replicates.Description: Five tissue samples were analyzed for each variant.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type brain tissue was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-diseased brain tissue was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Chi-square test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal Lewy body pathology; absence of α-synuclein phosphorylation.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Presence of Lewy bodies; α-synuclein phosphorylation ≥ 40%.
